register(address,address,bytes32).details: Groups are implicitly created when the first user registers. A user is in a group's referral tree if they have been referred or have referred others.

params.groupId: The group ID (group is auto-created on first registration)
params.referrer: The referrer address (must be in the group's referral tree, or address(0) for root registration)

params.enabled: True to enable allowlist, false to disable
